DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Asia . The aim study evaluate safety effectiveness liraglutide subject type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: A Post Marketing Surveillance ( PMS ) Study Liraglutide Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus India
DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes , include newlydiagnosed patient / already receive antidiabetic medication include GLP1 analogue , require treatment liraglutide accord clinical judgment treat physician Subjects capable give studyspecific sign informed consent collection information Subjects type 1 diabetes Subjects previously liraglutide Subjects previously enrol study Subjects participate another clinical trial Subjects hypersensitivity liraglutide excipients ( Disodium phosphate dihydrate , propylene glycol , phenol , water injection ) Subjects pregnant , breast feeding intention become pregnant within follow 6 month
